title: Words Bubble Up Like Soda Pop
short_cast: Somegoro Ichikawa, Hana Sugisaki, Megumi Han, Natsuki Hanae, Yuichiro Umehara, Megumi Nakajima, Sumire Morohoshi, Hiroshi Kamiya, Maaya Sakamoto, Koichi Yamadera, Kikuko Inoue
cast: Somegoro Ichikawa, Hana Sugisaki, Megumi Han, Natsuki Hanae, Yuichiro Umehara, Megumi Nakajima, Sumire Morohoshi, Hiroshi Kamiya, Maaya Sakamoto, Koichi Yamadera, Kikuko Inoue

desc: After meeting one bright, sunny day, a shy boy who expresses himself through haiku and a bubbly but self-conscious girl share a brief, magical summer.
